item.title: How can i make an NPC heal while casting BloodBarrage?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:6, topic:416339”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=518267.msg3766048#msg3766048 date=1317248235]

Sorry to say that we can’t give codes, we can help you change ur code around, but rules say we’re not a spoonfeeding community

I did suggest he use eclipse, which isn’t spoonfeeding, and I would help him with his code if it was PI, thats not spoonfeeding
[/quote]
It is PI… if you ever been in the NPCHandler class you would know.

else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP += 60;//never heard of the operator + after = ....... npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.sendMessage("The npc heals itself from blood barrage!"); c.gfx0(377); } else { System.out.println("Shit..no... ");[/quote]
Thanks superman, you just like pissing all over my mindset of I’m a good coder, don’t you?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make an NPC heal while casting BloodBarrage?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“WowILikeToCode, post:1, topic:416339”]Hey guys, I’ve added a boss to my runescape server, Kind of like nex for runescape, I want him to do the spell bloodbarrage and heal him, At first i couldn’t find a way to make him heal at all… But then i thought if i just make him heal 30 every time it does the spell. But i can’t work it out, Here’s the code i already have, Could someone modify it for me so it works??

else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP =+ 60; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); }[/quote]
Srry, don’t recognize this, doesn’t look like a PI, but try getting eclipse, it helps you get all your commands right, hence fixing your problems

Read full topic

item.title: How can i make an NPC heal while casting BloodBarrage?
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Hey guys, I’ve added a boss to my runescape server, Kind of like nex for runescape, I want him to do the spell bloodbarrage and heal him, At first i couldn’t find a way to make him heal at all… But then i thought if i just make him heal 30 every time it does the spell. But i can’t work it out, Here’s the code i already have, Could someone modify it for me so it works??

else if (n5 == 3) { //Blood Barrage if(npcs[i].HP <= 10000 && npcs[i].HP >= 7500) { npcs[i].HP =+ 60; npcs[i].attackType = 2; c.gfx0(377); }
